cgcloud__Account_Receivable__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Receivable__c
cgcloud__Account_Receivable__c.description: Holds the customer related information regarding invoices to be paid and debit and credit notes.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Required. Default name of this record.

cgcloud__Account__c.description: A reference to the account for which the invoice information is stored. Required.

cgcloud__Amount_Open__c.description: Latest amount to be paid (calculated in ERP system based on payment transactions). Not applicable for credit notes.

cgcloud__Amount__c.description: Original amount with which invoice, credit, or debit note was raised.

cgcloud__Document_Type__c.description: Invoice, credit, or debit note raised against an account.

cgcloud__Due_Date__c.description: Due date of invoice. Not applicable for credit notes.

cgcloud__External_Id__c.description: Unique reference number to track the invoice, debit note, or credit note that is generated.

cgcloud__Invoice_Status__c.description: Consolidated status set in ERP system based on account receivable transactions. Not applicable for credit notes.

cgcloud__Receipt_Date__c.description: Date on which the invoice, credit, or debit note was generated.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the account receivables record.
